general.title: Portfolio Website (Netlify + Cloudflare)
general.summary: This site is deployed via Netlify, fronted by Cloudflare (DNS/TLS/WAF). Includes Cloudflare GraphQL analytics & Netlify Lighthouse metrics.

general.title: Custom PC Build
general.summary: Sourced, assembled, and optimized a custom PC build. Documented BIOS, thermals, and performance tuning for daily dev + security tooling.
